description: Try our easy to follow Christmas Turkey With Gingerbread Stuffing recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Roast turkey,Low saturated fat,Roast,Seafood free,Stuffing,Low sugar,Potato,High protein,Christmas,Apple,Turkey,Peanut free
name: Christmas Turkey With Gingerbread Stuffing Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 granny smith apple, peeled, quartered, grated
180g middle bacon rashers, rind removed, chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 160Â°C. Heat oil and butter in a medium frying pan over medium heat. Cook diced onion and bacon for 10 minutes or until softened. Add apple and cook for 2 minutes or until softened. Remove from heat and cool.
Combine breadcrumbs and gingerbread in a large bowl. Add cooled onion mixture, egg and thyme. Season. Stir until well combined.

Fill front and back cavities of turkey with stuffing mixture. Secure legs with kitchen twine. Tuck wings under turkey. Transfer to a roasting pan and cook following packet instructions. Add potatoes to the pan for the last 40 minutes to roast.
Plate the turkey on a platter with roasted potatoes around the sides and decorate with bay leaves, to serve.
